trans-unit.source: Interacts with the parser to build the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml"></xref> control.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlBuilder"></xref> class.
Adds literal content to the control.

The AppendLiteralString method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlBuilder> class overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AppendLiteralString%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> class so that the method of the base class has no effect.
The literal content to add to the control.
Obtains the <xref:System.Type> for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml"></xref> control's specified child control.

The GetChildControlType method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlBuilder> class overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.GetChildControlType%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> class.
This implementation of the GetChildControlType method always returns `null`.
The tag name of the child control.
An array of attributes contained in the child control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.GetChildControlType*> method is overridden to always return <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Determines whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml"></xref> control needs to get its inner text.

The NeedsTagInnerText method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlBuilder> class overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.NeedsTagInnerText%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> class to always return `true`.
The inner text is the text between the opening and closing tags of the control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.NeedsTagInnerText*> method is overridden to always return <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Sets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Xml"></xref> control's inner text.
This method loads the <xref:System.String> passed in to an XML document to determine whether it is well-formed.
If it is, the code calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.SetTagInnerText%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> class.
The value to insert as the inner text.
The <xref:System.String> object passed in is not well-formed XML.
